parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Client token, used to ensure the idempotence of the request. Generate a unique value for this parameter from your client to ensure that it is unique across different requests. The ClientToken only supports ASCII characters. Note: If you do not specify this, the system will automatically use the RequestId of the API request as the ClientToken identifier. The RequestId may differ for each API request.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID where the RouteTargetGroup is located.

You can obtain the region ID by calling the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) API.

parameters.name: RouteTargetGroupId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the RouteTargetGroup.
